sys_ux_client_script.name: Apply parFilters2

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_72010d439360021026ba7e8efaba10cb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes>8f0ec3492c5f441781f1f44f36351242</includes><macroponent display_value="Home default copy">d8ec9af49364021026ba7e8efaba1076</macroponent><name>Apply parFilters2</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
	const mergePARFiltersV2 = imports["global.mergePARFilters"]().v2;
	const { appliedFilters } = event.payload;
	api.setState("parFilters2", ({ currentValue, api }) => {
		const { parFilters } = mergePARFiltersV2(currentValue, appliedFilters);
		return parFilters;
	});
	//api.setState("followFilter1",true);
	//api.setState("followFilter2",false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-28 13:41:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>72010d439360021026ba7e8efaba10cb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Apply parFilters2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Automated Asset Management System" source="x_757927_automat_0">4b28a3fb9354021026ba7e8efaba1069</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Automated Asset Management System">4b28a3fb9354021026ba7e8efaba1069</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_72010d439360021026ba7e8efaba10cb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-28 13:47:11</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
